item.title: Forza Horizon 5 PS5 Release Date Announced
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/forza-horizon-5-ps5-release-date-announced/

PlayStation has announced the release date for Forza Horizon 5 on PlayStation 5 (PS5). In a new trailer showcasing the game’s new “Horizon Realms”, it was revealed that the game will launch on PS5 on April 25, 2025.

“Dive into Horizon Realms! Explore 12 Evolving Worlds: 11 previously limited-time only locations and the completely new Horizon Stadium Circuit,” the description reads.

Regarding the game’s launch on PS5, Forza Horizon 5 will feature PlayStation Trophies, in-game badges, and various accolades. Those accolades will unlock new cars to use in the game.

Check out the trailer for yourself, below.

Forza Horizon 5 was first released in November 2021 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC. The game has been highly touted by critics and players alike, with a 92 OpenCritic score. After months of rumors and speculation, the game was officially announced for PS5 back in January.

Are you going to pick up Forza Horizon 5 on PS5 now that you know the release date? Let us know down below, and in the official Insider Gaming Forums.
